review: It's a fairly simple product that works well once you get it set up properly. If you have some devices that are wireless and some that are wired, you might run into some initial problems. Make sure you download the Chromecast extension for your browser to save you some headache. You also might want to grab Plex or some kind of media server for your computer. This will tie into Chromecast and make your life easier.I bought this for my PS4 since it didn't stream media at the time. Then Sony released the PS4 Media Player that would have made Chromecast obsolete for me. The PS4 Media Player seems to want to work only when it feels like it. When that happens, I scream at my PS4 and then go ahead and use Chromecast as my backup.
author: J. D. Fohs

review: I have always enjoyed streaming devices and with there being so many I have trouble picking. I liked the Chromcast and the fact that I can easily control it with my cell phone.
